name: Typehunter
description:
The HTML5 version does not seem to work in Safari
Game made for Paint Jam 2018 in two days with LÖVE.

You are a Typehunter, a mercenary in a fallen world.

You are tasked with a mission of utmost importance.

Can you survive the Wilderness Trail?

Type... To survive the ruin!

It's the Dark Souls of typing games.
